metadata.title: CVE-2018-20748 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
LibVNC before 0.9.12 contains multiple heap out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities in libvncclient/rfbproto.c. The fix for CVE-2018-20019 was incomplete.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-20748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1.3').
tightvnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
